title: Jeremiah and the Word of God
itunes:title: Jeremiah and the Word of God
description: I’ve always loved the prophet Jeremiah, and not just as a literary/spiritual figure, but as a person. He was known as the “weeping prophet” and his nickname was “terror on every side.” Against that background, we listen to him in our reading for today and gain encouragement as we evangelize through struggle.

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
